puzzles.objective: White to play and win material
hints: Look for a forcing move that attacks the king
Consider a bishop sacrifice on f7
After Bxf7+ Ke7, you can fork the king and queen with Nd5+

puzzles.objective: White to play and threaten checkmate
hints: Look for a move that attacks multiple squares
The queen can move to a powerful square
Qh5 threatens both the pawn on e5 and checkmate on f7

puzzles.objective: White to play and attack f7
hints: The f7 square is weak in Black's position
Your knight can jump to attack f7
Ng5 attacks both f7 and h7

puzzles.objective: White to play and pin the knight
hints: The knight on f6 is defending important squares
You can pin pieces to more valuable pieces behind them
Bg5 pins the knight to the queen

puzzles.objective: White to play and pin the knight
hints: The knight on c6 is undefended
You can pin it to the king
